title: The Bots have taken over!
body:
It's like an egg sac hatched over the weekend. It's impossible to play ARAM without being swamped by bots. I just had a game where it was me and 4 bots against another guy and 4 bots. Most of the people on my ARAM friends list seem to have given up altogether.

Riot Please! We are dying down here!

replies.body: i said bots play better then these people and next game i get a bot in summoners rift for the first time ever. that is not rng. that is hacked. that is stalking, and illegal, and breaks ANY eula agreement u ever had with me

xp farming bots or just not enough people queuing bots, at least the fill bots play better than noobs usually and even build safer. What they should really do more about are fake troll accounts or friends climbing rank off each other on fake accounts
Imagine playing ARAM at all. What a useless mode.
yeah, straight into team fights, so useless, seeing everybodys' plays alot easier and knowing who to nag with tips

and riot wont get rid of them and doesn't want anything to do with them they don't lose money for it they gain money from it because people buy botted accounts purchase RP on them and then it gets banned for being a botted account lmfao you're just scamming yourself. Im not complaining tho i get easy mastery vs bots in pvp at early hours of the morning
